title: FS: A Pair of Nice Graded T212 Obaks (Vancouver)
author: Bosox Blair

posts.post_title: FS: A Pair of Nice Graded T212 Obaks (Vancouver)
posts.post_content:
Have a couple nice Obaks to sell.

1) Gardner (PSA 4) clean back "Convenient Sensible" - $75

2) Chenault (SGC 50) stamped back "Speak for Themselves" - $65

For sale until August 28.  Add $5 for shipping (will ship weekend of Aug 31).

Paypal payment please!

Trades also considered...some interests of mine include: graded Obaks of Vancouver team, pre-war Red Sox cards, interesting OJs with nice images, Chief Bender white hat pose with green background, cards of Sam Crawford, etc...

Cheers,
Blair
